Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie-cn
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-cn due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-cn due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
